description: This course is to provide a thorough review and explanation of Chinese grammar with an emphasis on translation. Students will explore the nature of Standard Chinese grammatical structure in general and learn how and where it differs from the grammar of English. By the end of the semester, students are expected to be able to analyze the grammatical structure of Chinese sentences and to apply the grammar knowledge into translation practices. This class will also prepare students for taking other advanced level Chinese language courses to explore key issues of the professional world through the study of Chinese.
name: Translation and Grammar of Written Chinese

section.name: Translation and Grammar of Written Chinese

values.name: Translation and Grammar of Written Chinese
